incase anyone wondering about the ending, you should probably read it's previous chapter.
so basically in HapiHapi Happiness, the woman in there is a mom of koyuki right? She was messing up someone else's family by stealing the dad. ruining their family, if you can see in the panel at early of the previous chapter, you can see the wife holding a baby around same age as koyuki, and she has same bright hair color. "confirming" she's the very same girl(kiriko). kiriko also explain to koyuki that her mom always back home drunk and quite messed up, probably because of stress of being single mother.

At the ending, kiriko look so upset, because she just learned that not only koyuki's mom stealing her dad, she's having sex with him for money too.

I absolutely do not need this ending, it makes no god damn sense. Koyuki, the main girl, walks up to her friend after taking the entrance exams and says, "Kiriko-chan, your number is on the board! You did it!" - meaning that her friend (the one she wanted to go to school with) passed the entrance exam. She shows her the video, says, "Because of you!" and leaves... for some reason. And we see the card with someones' (and, no, it's not clear - I ASSUME it's Koyuki's, but I have no way of knowing) on the ground with the number "419006" on it - which is also on the wall of people that passed... So... Huh? Why did her friend have that video? Why was so upset (especially when she knew Koyuki's mother was a piece of shit after finding her crying like that and the fact that she's crying her eyes out in the video of her)? "Because of you" what? Makes no god damn sense at all.
